PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_EvaporativeCoolerPHistory
PropertySetDef.Definition: Definition from IAI: Evaporative cooler performance history attributes.

PropertyDef.Name: Effectiveness
PropertyDef.Definition: Ratio of the change in dry bulb temperature of the (primary) air stream to the difference between the entering dry bulb temperature of the (primary) air and the wet-bulb temperature of the (secondary) air.

PropertyDef.Name: SensibleHeatTransferRate
PropertyDef.Definition: Sensible heat transfer rate to primary air flow.

PropertyDef.Name: LatentHeatTransferRate
PropertyDef.Definition: Latent heat transfer rate to primary air flow.

PropertyDef.Name: TotalHeatTransferRate
PropertyDef.Definition: Total heat transfer rate to primary air flow.

PropertyDef.Name: EffectivenessTable
PropertyDef.Definition: Total heat transfer effectiveness curve as a function of the primary air flow rate.

PropertyDef.Name: AirPressureDropCurve
PropertyDef.Definition: Air pressure drop as function of air flow rate.

PropertyDef.Name: WaterPressDropCurve
PropertyDef.Definition: Water pressure drop as function of water flow rate.
